content.rendered:
Tempulli College has accreditation from The Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport – CILT for three professional programs in the field of Logistics and Transport.

1.      Initial Certificate,

2.      International Certificate

3.      International Diploma in Transport and Logistics.

Kosovo remains the only country in the region where professional studies are offered for domestic and foreign students in the field of transport and logistics.

The Chartered Institute of Logistics and Transport – CILT represents the transport and logistics industries from around the world.
